import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './styles.scoped.css' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import Footer from './../../footer/footer' import Header from './../../header/header' import axios from 'axios'; import url from '../../../config'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Link, Route, Switch } from 'react-router-dom'; import { data } from 'jquery'; class reservation extends Component { information = []; constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { phone: '', arrive: '', depart: '', hotel: '', location:'', roomType: '0', room: '', listRoom: [], rent: [] } this.saveLocal = this.saveLocal.bind(this) this.selectRoomType = this.selectRoomType.bind(this) } componentDidMount() { axios.get(url + "/rooms").then(res => { this.setState({ listRoom: res.data.map(value => value.noroom) }); }) } saveLocal() { if (localStorage.getItem("infor") !== null) { this.information = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("infor")) } this.information.push({ phone: this.state.phone, arrive: this.state.arrive, depart: this.state.depart, hotel: this.state.hotel, roomType: this.state.roomType }); console.log(this.information); localStorage.setItem("infor", JSON.stringify(this.information)); } myhandleChange = (event) => { let name = event.target.name; let value = event.target.value; this.setState({ [name]: value }); } selectRoomType = (event) => { let name = event.target.name; let value = event.target.value; this.setState({ [name]: value }); if (this.state.roomType != "0") { axios.get(url + "/rooms?roomtype_id=" + this.state.roomType).then(res => { this.setState({ listRoom: res.data.map(value => value.noroom), }) }); axios.get(url + "/roomtypes?roomtype_id=" + this.state.roomType).then(res => { localStorage.setItem("rate", res.data.rent); }) } } // localStorage.setItem("noroom",this.listRoom); // console.log(res.data.map(value=>value.noroom)) Sau khi lấy ra được phòng nào thì hiện thị ra trang số 2 render() { return (
